title: Trans Microsystems
description: Learn how to design biomedical microsystems ready for clinical and biomedical translation. Course blends theory with examples of successful biomedical research, clinical translation, and case studies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BMED 3310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and BMED 3600 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
